title: The $16 Ad Blocker That Stops Pop-Ups in Its Tracks
description: Pay once and block malicious ads, phishing links, and hidden trackers on up to nine devices.
content:
Pop-ups are everywhere these days. In fact, you probably got one while trying to read this article. From auto-playing video ads to tracking banners that follow you across the internet, it’s enough to make browsing feel like a chore. Put an end to the barrage and get a subscription to top-rated AdGuard for just $15.97 ($169.99) when you use code FAMPLAN at checkout.

AdGuard works on Windows and Mac desktops, as well as mobile browsers, helping you enjoy the web with fewer distractions and greater peace of mind. It also blocks malicious ads, phishing links, and hidden trackers that try to steal your data.

Parents can use AdGuard to create a safer online experience for their children by setting up custom filters to block inappropriate websites and unwanted content.

Pay once, protect on up to nine devices. Use code FAMPLAN to get AdGuard  for just $15.97 (MSRP $169.99) at StackSocial.
